EmailTemplate.subject: Does this make your stores look fat?
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Unlock {{company.Company Name:default=your store}}'s true potential with a software-defined approach <[[https://www.ncr.com/retail/software-defined-store/unlock-potential]]> {{lead.First Name:default=Dear Mr/Ms}}, what could it mean for {{company.Company Name:default=your store}} to run “thin”? This means taking the software off your store devices and managing it all from the cloud.  The numbers in this recently commissioned Total Economic Impact™ study by Forrester Consulting <[[https://www.ncr.com/retail/software-defined-store/unlock-potential]]> offer a compelling case: -   57% annual hardware cost savings per store -   50% reduction in unplanned downtime, mitigating revenue loss -   50% reduction in break-fix and software upgrade costs -   Improved store efficiency by 10% -   6-month payback One retail customer said: “With Software Defined Store, opening a new store is much quicker than before. There is probably 50% savings in time and effort.
